## Introduction

This is an example Quarto (QMD) notebook file that can be opened in Positron using the QMD notebooks extension.

## R Code Example

```{r}
# Create a simple plot
x <- 1:10
y <- x^2
plot(x, y, main="Quadratic Function", type="b")
```

## Python Code Example

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Generate data
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

# Create plot
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title("Sine Wave")
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("sin(x)")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
